name: Tumblr Pastel Damask Dash Theme (10 Color Options)
description: A simple patterned dashboard theme with code that's compatible for the new header style. Feel free to edit anything, or msg me on tumblr @ eatyourheirs if you want something changed/made more accessible. This code has certain things blocked from displaying (like tumblr's seasonal dots) based on my own personal preferences but that coding is easily removable.
